{"step_by_step_thinking": "Based on the provided documents, HOXA11 is associated with endometrial disease. Document [12] mentions that there is a decrease in HOXA11 expression in eutopic mid-secretory endometrium in women with endometriosis-associated infertility. Document [17] indicates that HOXA11 mediated dysregulation is observed in women with endometriosis.
